title: Wout van Aert’s Monument Mission on Schedule: ‘There’s Still Room for Improvement’
content:
'We’re trying to get at a higher level at the monuments.' Could the calendar tweaks and a different approach to 'Holy Week' finally pay off?

Read the full article at Wout van Aert’s Monument Mission on Schedule: ‘There’s Still Room for Improvement’ on Velo.
author: ahood
